name: graylog
description: Graylog is a self-hosted log management and SIEM platform for collecting, indexing, and analyzing log data. It includes dashboards, alerts, log search, and integrates with Elasticsearch and MongoDB for monitoring large systems.
features: Log Management: Collect, index, and analyze log data from servers, applications, and network devices.
SIEM Capabilities: Security information and event management with threat detection and correlation.
Elasticsearch Backend: Leverage Elasticsearch for powerful full-text search and log indexing.
Real-Time Analysis: Search and analyze logs in real-time with sub-second query response.
Dashboard Creation: Build custom dashboards with widgets for visualizing log data and metrics.
Alert Configuration: Set up alerts based on log patterns, thresholds, and anomaly detection.
Stream Processing: Route and process logs with pipelines, extractors, and enrichment rules.
Scalable Architecture: Horizontal scaling to handle millions of log messages per second.
